name: Sunny Day
content: How i long for a sunny day
Iwant to dance i want to sing
Hey hey hey hey oh sunny day
Please don't let us want for you
Let you sun beams shine on us
Come out dear and dhine for all
出来吧，亲爱的，照射万物
